name: Wind Up!
description:
Wind Up! is a one-hit KO multiplayer fighting game for 2 - 4 players where wind-up toys punch each other with spring-loaded fists to prove who is the top toy!


Ranging from standard deathmatches ("Last Toy Standing"), to time-based games ("Point Panic"), a mode based on classic spinning tops ("Spin to Win."), Coin Collecting, First Person Punching and more to come Wind Up! has plenty of ways to make some mayhem!




Featuring a variety of perilous levels! From the dizzying heights of the living room table, to the deadly kitchen sink, an action-filled toy racecar track and even a hazardous school playground! There's plenty of levels where you can duke it out with your buddies!




Add temporary power-up accessories to your toy to gain an advantage over your rivals! Includes Rocket Punch, Super Spinny Spikey Balls, the Terrifying Power of Bubbles and more!




Customise your toy to stand out from the crowd with a large selection of stylish(?) hats!




We at Fat Familiar (the indie studio behind Wind Up!) are currently brewing up more features! Including but not limited to game modes, levels and hats. Stay tuned for updates!
